name: Quest for Galaxia
overview: Quest for Galaxia is a video game for the Commodore Amiga platforms. The game was released in 1993. The player controls a spaceship that can only move sideways. The player is attacked by the opponent's spaceships that try to shoot him down. The opponents come in clusters. For each plane shot down, the player receives points. Published in Amiga Power 26 (Jun 1993)
